name: Fantasia: At Regime's End [Full Game]
description:
"This assassination marks the end of a Regime!”

- STORY - 

When the Kingdom of Requia fell into the hands of it’s enemies, Valledyne, the princess  fortunately managed to escape with her two trusted bodyguards. You are an assassin sent by Valledyne to kill the Princess and end the war once and for all, but will your allegiance falter? 

Trigger/content warnings for mentions and/or images of: death, execution, suicide, language, minimal suggestive themes, drug use, alcohol. We recommend that players be at least 16 years of age to play this game.

- CHARACTERS -

- FEATURES- 

  • FULL VERSION AND COMPLETELY FREE to play! 
  • Over 341.000 words and over 10+ hours of reading time
  • Decide everyone's fate! Your love interest can end up with other characters if you want them to! 
  • A (still) very sarcastic narrator
  • Play ash Ash (yes, Ash is a she!) and romance 4 love Interests, 3 male, 1 female, with three outfits each
  • Play truth or dare! (Or question and command)
  • Cameos of ko-fi backers
  • SIX different routes
